verbose_text: Besides, by eliminating spleen derived endothelin-1 (ET-1), sequentially increasing peripheral nitric oxide (NO) concentration and decreasing the hepatic NO level, splenectomy improves not only intrahepatic portal vein resistance but also splanchnic and systemic hyperdynamic circulation in cirrhotic patients [XREF_BIBR], resulting in amelioration in general condition and liver function.
